Params: {3: 'After getting to know Noan for a bit, he always swings by whenever you fall ill or get hurt.'}
{3: "While he's not exactly a medic outside of emergencies, having someone to chat with during recovery is a real comfort."}
{3: 'He pulls out some apples and starts peeling them on the table.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, you remember him finding an apple among his gifts when he first landed in Babylonia.'}
{2: 'Is that a tradition among traveling merchants?', 3: '16'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Yep. When you're facing a long journey, you can't just hand over all your stuff to someone else.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Every base is different, depending on what they're lacking and what they've got in abundance.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Sometimes, lending a hand can be traded for goods, and the cost isn't set in stone. The bill hidden in freebies or services can sometimes be steeper.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'After all, you just said the freebies could be pricier.', 3: '24'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Well, you're the one who got the ball rolling.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "If it weren't for those acts of kindness, if you hadn't helped me out, I wouldn't be here shooting the breeze with you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is that all there is to it?', 3: '27', 4: "I doubt you're just looking to repay a favor.", 5: '27'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "There are a few things I haven't mentioned.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'So... make sure you stay hale and hearty.', 4: '1'}
